Even though this XML search will probably load and is a healthy start toward a completed search, please be aware that this search will probably not work as is and will require some human inspection and modification.
search.name: Nupedia
search.description: Nupedia is a new online, peer-reviewed, international encyclopedia. It is searchable and will also be organized hierarchically and alphabetically. Nupedia is "open content" or "free"; we want the contents of the encyclopedia to receive the widest possible distribution. Reading Nupedia.com will always be free of charge and therefore the project of building it depends on volunteers--possibly you!
